tool_description: Largest collection of verified music credits in existence.
title: Music Credits

api_list.name: GetAlbumDetails
api_list.description: Get album details by album id or UPC
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://music-credits2.p.rapidapi.com/api/c/v2/album/id/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "music-credits2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description:
keyword	string non-empty The query string to search for

type	string Default: "all" Enum: "all" "artists" "professionals" "albums" "tracks"  The type of entity that will search in.

limit	number [ 1 .. 50 ] Default: 10 The number of items should return in every entity.

offset	number >= 0 Default: 0 The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description:
keyword	string non-empty The query string to search for

type	string Default: "all" Enum: "all" "artists" "professionals" "albums" "tracks"  The type of entity that will search in.

offset	number >= 0 Default: 0 The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set.
